history.subject: lab3中CPU为什么不会自动为PTE_A置一？
history.content:
对labcodes_answer/lab3_result中的swap_fifo.c做patch如下：

--- kern/mm/swap_fifo.c	2015-05-07 22:11:17.066648874 +0800
+++ kern/mm/swap_fifo.c	2015-05-07 22:11:14.819982267 +0800
@@ -6,6 +6,27 @@
 #include <swap_fifo.h>
 #include <list.h>
 
+struct mm_struct global_mm;
+void clear_list(){
+    int i;
+    cprintf("Start Clear List\n");
+    for(i=0x1000; i<=0x5000; i+=0x1000){
+        pte_t *ptep = get_pte(global_mm.pgdir, i, 0);
+        (*ptep) &= ~PTE_A;
+    }
+    cprintf("End Clear List\n");
+}
+
+void print_list(){
+    int i;
+    cprintf("Start Print List\n");
+    for(i=0x1000;i<=0x5000;i+=0x1000){
+        pte_t *ptep = get_pte(global_mm.pgdir, i, 0);
+        cprintf("%d\t", !!((*ptep) & PTE_A));
+    }
+    cprintf("\nEnd Start List\n");
+}
+
 /* [wikipedia]The simplest Page Replacement Algorithm(PRA) is a FIFO algorithm. The first-in, first-out
  * page replacement algorithm is a low-overhead algorithm that requires little book-keeping on
  * the part of the operating system. The idea is obvious from the name - the operating system
@@ -44,6 +65,7 @@
 static int
 _fifo_map_swappable(struct mm_struct *mm, uintptr_t addr, struct Page *page, int swap_in)
 {
+    global_mm = *mm;
     list_entry_t *head=(list_entry_t*) mm->sm_priv;
     list_entry_t *entry=&(page->pra_page_link);
  
@@ -87,12 +109,17 @@
     assert(pgfault_num==4);
     cprintf("write Virt Page b in fifo_check_swap\n");
     *(unsigned char *)0x2000 = 0x0b;
+    print_list();
+    clear_list();
+    print_list();
     assert(pgfault_num==4);
     cprintf("write Virt Page e in fifo_check_swap\n");
     *(unsigned char *)0x5000 = 0x0e;
+    print_list();
     assert(pgfault_num==5);
     cprintf("write Virt Page b in fifo_check_swap\n");
     *(unsigned char *)0x2000 = 0x0b;
+    print_list();
     assert(pgfault_num==5);
     cprintf("write Virt Page a in fifo_check_swap\n");
     *(unsigned char *)0x1000 = 0x0a;

一开始访问a、b、c、d之后前四个PTE_A置上了：

1       1       1       1       0

然后清空PTE_A：

0       0       0       0       0

然后访问e：

0       0       0       0       1

奇怪的是然后访问b之后

0       0       0       0       1

为什么这里b的PTE_A没有置一那？
